text: Simply Carrie is the debut album by Carrie Lucas. Released in 1977 on the Soul Train Records label. ==Track listing== #"I Gotta Keep Dancin'" #"Me for You" #"Play by Your Rule" #"Tender" #"Jammin' Tenderly (Tender, Pt. 2)" #"I Gotta Get Away from Your Love" #"I'll Close Love's Door" #"What's the Question" #"Men Kiss and Tell" ===Album=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2"| Album ! colspan="2"| Chart positions ! rowspan="2"| Record label |- style="font-size:smaller;" ! width="40"| US ! width="40"| US R&B; |- | rowspan="1"| 1977 | align="left"| Simply Carrie | 183 | -- | rowspan="1"| Soul Train Records |- |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2"| Single ! colspan="3"| Chart positions |- style="font-size:smaller;" ! width="40"| US ! width="40"| US R&B; ! width="40"| US Dance |- | rowspan="1"|1977 | align="left"| "I Gotta Keep Dancin'" | 64 | 44 | 2 |- |} ==References== Category:1977 debut albums Category:Carrie Lucas albums
title: Simply Carrie
